attributes.action: Lower the voting age to 16 + in the event of a 2nd EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details: Their voices should have been given more importance. In the Scottish referendum 16 to 18 year olds were rightly given a vote, another important vote for this country in which their age group was truly represented, and in my opinion added to the integrity of the outcome.
attributes.background: The EU referendum which took place on the 23 of June did not truly give a voice to our youngest adults. The decision taken will impact upon the lives of young adults between the ages of 16-18, far more than the older generations, and they will be forced to live with the consequences the longest.
